item.description:
Hey Aussies!

So i have had a few responses through Meetup but a bunch outside the site, i have 15 confirmed, a mix of Aussies and Americans so I've reserved a 3 condos for now and we can add to that accordingly.

Details as followed hav'nt changed much apart from the fact that i have arranged it so that you can pay your deposit and balance directly to the company that i found the deal with, Tour de Sport. Call Matt on 888 364 0141 and quote booking number 551177 and you will be "all set"!

Please let me know when you have so I can keep track of it, thanks.

Damo


The most attractive deal that i have seen is for $175 per person for the Fri/Sat night accom in 3 bedroom condos (half a mile on free shuttle route from the mountain with kitchen, bath, fireplace, tv, dvd, hot tub etc) and $110 for a 2 day lift pass inc all tax/charges etc which i think is really good considering lift tickets are usually $80 per day.

If we have enough interest which i think we should i can go ahead and book, i would like to do this by jan25th. they need a $50 ea deposit as a whole group then i think it makes sense for everyone to pay their remainder direct to them depending on whether you need just the accom or a lift pass and rental ($60 for the weekend)

I reckon we would have a great time up there, even if you dont ski or ride its a great opportunity to get out of Boston, play and party with some other fellow Aussies and see some of New England in the winter. Invite your friends as well!!

Hope to see some positive feedback, any questions feel free to call/email.

Damo
857 204 0495
damo_h77@yahoo.com

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Killington ski weekend!!
